title: Sri Lanka counts cyclone cost as toll hits 465
description: Sri Lankan authorities said they would need around US$7 billion to rebuild homes, industries and roads destroyed by Cyclone Ditwah.
content: COLOMBO: Sri Lankan authorities said on Wednesday (Dec 3) they would need around US$7 billion to rebuild homes, industries and roads destroyed by Cyclone Ditwah, which has left at least 465 people de… [+2251 chars]
